news_header: Hamas to transfer four dead hostages to Israel; includes mother and children, triggering national grief.
news_original_title: Israel prepares to receive first dead hostages from Hamas
news_text: Hamas is set to transfer the bodies of four hostages, including a mother and her two children, to Israel. This marks the first handover of deceased hostages since the ceasefire began. The news has caused widespread grief in Israel, particularly for the Bibas family, whose fate has been uncertain since the October 7 attack. The transfer process remains unclear, with calls for a dignified handover.
